name: 99Seconds
overview: The saga continues after 99Bullets. Now your problem isn't the number of bullets, rather the amount of time. 99Seconds, a fun, retro-style video game, where you can modify time to avoid all kinds of dangers. After finishing off Black Eye, V-99 entered a mysterious zone called Bit 8, without knowing why V-99 could modify time, slow it down and even stop it. But everything became complicated with the appearance of the BLACK VECTORS: mysterious beings that aim to destroy any intruder who reaches Bit 8. Features • Control V-99, dodging, using SLOW DOWN to slow, stop and even go back in time!• Arcade mobility like in the classic arcade games!• Retro-style levels!• Incredible enemy patterns!
